p: In our previous studies [ 32, 33], we have analyzed the changes induced by the adsorption of lavender and basil essential oils on the physico-chemical and morphological properties of hydroxyapatite nanoparticles. These studies indicated a better adsorption of the lavender essential oil on the surface of hydroxyapatite nanoparticles, and antibacterial tests proved their better antibacterial activity against S. aureus, E coli, and MRSA bacterial strains in comparison with the hydroxyapatite nanoparticles covered with basil essential oil.
